articles.author: Evan Gershkovich
articles.title: Putin’s Unexpected Challenge: Snubs From His Central Asian Allies - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Russia’s invasion of Ukraine has Kazakhstan and its neighbors rethinking their alliances. That’s given the U.S. a window to try to regain influence in a region it had stepped back from in recent years.
